item.title: Epsilion - 317 server development!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:27, topic:379651”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=475492.msg3479713#msg3479713 date=1296003805]

In PK video:

  • AGS graphic disappears
  • Defence emote should be played when opponent starts attack animation

Do you only go around pointing out glitches in servers? Its only beta testing im aware of the AGS graphic and the defence emote i could care less about. You wonder why you get verbally abused on these forums? Its because your a cocky little bitch. Suck my balls faggot.
[/quote]This is a failed development if you don’t want to fix those bugs. They are both HUGE bugs that make the server look horrible yet you can fix them in 30 seconds but don’t “feel like it”

This is nothing but Project Insanity which is horrible in every way possible

Don’t even tell me it’s not as me and Sanity both agree it’s crap[/quote]

Did I say I didnt or wasnt going to fix them? No, I simply stated that i dont care about them at the moment. They arent “HUGE” bugs, they are so small that i have better things to be working on right now. Also, i could care less about your opinion as you wont be playing my server (probably) You just stick to making your development threads while other people code your you a server.

Another thing, im aware project insanity isnt the best source out there, but its better then delta stability and content wise and way easier to program then Hyperion. I am willing to admit that I’m not on the programming level to write my own combat for hyperion and write a bunch of other shit. Atleast im programming stuff myself and not buying my shit right?

[quote=“egyptmo21, post:28, topic:379651”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=475492.msg3480447#msg3480447 date=1296075439]

In PK video:

  • AGS graphic disappears
  • Defence emote should be played when opponent starts attack animation

Do you only go around pointing out glitches in servers? Its only beta testing im aware of the AGS graphic and the defence emote i could care less about. You wonder why you get verbally abused on these forums? Its because your a cocky little bitch. Suck my balls faggot.
[/quote]This is a failed development if you don’t want to fix those bugs. They are both HUGE bugs that make the server look horrible yet you can fix them in 30 seconds but don’t “feel like it”

This is nothing but Project Insanity which is horrible in every way possible

Don’t even tell me it’s not as me and Sanity both agree it’s crap

100% this.[/quote]

You dont know what you’re talking about. Leave these forums or atleast dont post on my thread. Kthnxbai.

Read full topic

item.title: Epsilion - 317 server development!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“mursanari, post:21, topic:379651”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=475492.msg3478574#msg3478574 date=1295907139]

looks nice, but its you or me but the colours look kinda messed up on some pics, other then that looks excelent and its a nice change to the standard dspk leech.

I support this project

It’s probably you just not being used to some of the HD features on a 317, and yea. DSPK pisses me off, i used to use it to, then i realized it had a memory leak and EVERYONE was using it.

Thanks for the support <3

EDIT: Actually, there are some texture glitches. Tzhaar ground is really dark blue (doesnt look half bad to me actually) and the warriors guild walls are white
[/quote]

  • the varrock floor texture looks a bit blue aswell when it should be grayish :.
    And are you releasing this? Because if you Release people will use it like its Dspk (wich isnt that bad but you get my point :D)[/quote]

I guess i could release it after I make a server out of it. But i’ll probably add an anti leech of some sort, unlike DSPK.

Read full topic
